amendment.description: Amendment establishes a program for Federal employees to donate unused annual leave to other Federal employees who have been adversely affected by natural disasters and emergencies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 21 (by Ms. Norton) in the Congressional Record of May 14, 1997 to establish a program for federal employees can donate unused annual leave to other federal employees who have been adversely affected by natural disasters or emergencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoyer amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
